system.description: You restore life to a deceased creature. The subject must have been dead no longer than 1 day per caster level. The subject's soul must be free and willing to return. The subject returns with 1 hit point per level; lost levels and Constitution are restored. The subject loses one level (or 1 point of Constitution if 1st level). A character who died with spells prepared has a 50% chance of losing any given spell. The subject is penalized -1 on all attack rolls, saves, and checks for every two levels lost; this penalty lasts 8 hours. The subject takes 1 point of Constitution drain (permanent) that cannot be healed by normal or magical means. Raise dead does not restore life to a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore a creature that has been turned into an undead.
